bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Alternative Names gan zeng 皯 𪒟 ; que ban 雀斑 , sparrow speckles; que luan ban 雀卵斑 , sparrow egg speckles; fen zi 粉滓 , dregs; mian yun 面 䵴 , facial speckles; Abbreviated Designation zeng 𪒟 , speckles. Pathological Condition of numerous dark spots appearing on one’s face. Qian jin bei ji fang 千金備急方 6: 治人面䵟 𪒟 黑， 膚色粗陋，皮厚狀丑方 , “Recipe for thick skin and an unsightly appearance to cure facial dermal dark spots , associated with coarse and crude skin”.
